title: API Configuration
description: Sets up a PUT endpoint at /ts/pets/:id for updating an existing pet's information.

title: ID Validation
description: Checks that the pet ID in the URL is valid.

title: Update Fields
description: Defines which fields can be updated - name, status (available, pending, adopted), and age. All fields are optional so you can update just what you need.

title: Updating the Pet
description: Takes the changes and updates the pet in the store.

title: Not Found
description: If the pet doesn't exist, returns a 404 error.

title: Success Response
description: Returns the updated pet with all its current information and a 200 OK status.

title: Error Handling
description: Catches validation errors (like invalid status values) and other problems, returning helpful error messages.
